Basic Concepts.mainBlurb: Learn the core syntax, data structures, and fundamental concepts of the Move Language.
Basic Concepts.extendedBlurb: Dive into the core principles of the Move Language. Learn the essential syntax, explore key data structures, and start mastering the fundamental concepts of the Move Language.

Advanced Move.mainBlurb: Master advanced concepts in Move, including storage, events, objects, and resource accounts.
Advanced Move.extendedBlurb: Take your understanding of Move to the next level with advanced concepts. Learn about storage operations, resource management, and smart object design to build robust applications.
